channel.title: Errors help!
channel.description:
EDITED: Ok managed to get the errors down to 18 :D few left
[code]src\server\model\minigames\clanwars\ClanWarHandler.java:32: error: cannot find s ymbol public static ClanWar[] clanWars = new ClanWar[100]; ^ symbol: class ClanWar location: class ClanWarHandler src\server\model\minigames\clanwars\ClanWarHandler.java:34: error: cannot find s ymbol public void wallTimer(final ClanWar c) { ^ symbol: class ClanWar location: class ClanWarHandler src\server\model\minigames\clanwars\ClanWarHandler.java:131: error: cannot find symbol public void handleWin(String clan, ClanWar c) { ^ symbol: class ClanWar location: class ClanWarHandler src\server\model\minigames\clanwars\ClanWarHandler.java:267: error: cannot find symbol public void removePlayer(Client c, ClanWar c2) { ^ symbol: class ClanWar location: class ClanWarHandler src\server\model\minigames\clanwars\ClanWarHandler.java:343: error: cannot find symbol public void walls(ClanWar c, int id, int height) { ^ symbol: class ClanWar location: class ClanWarHandler src\server\model\minigames\clanwars\ClanWarHandler.java:366: error: cannot find symbol public void checkLeave(Client c, ClanWar c2) { ^ symbol: class ClanWar location: class ClanWarHandler src\server\model\minigames\clanwars\ClanWarHandler.java:378: error: cannot find symbol public void updateInterface(Client c, ClanWar c2) { ^ symbol: class ClanWar location: class ClanWarHandler src\server\model\minigames\clanwars\ClanWarHandler.java:456: error: cannot find symbol public boolean wallDown(ClanWar c) { ^ symbol: class ClanWar location: class ClanWarHandler src\server\model\minigames\clanwars\ClanWarHandler.java:32: error: cannot find s ymbol public static ClanWar[] clanWars = new ClanWar[100]; ^ symbol: class ClanWar location: class ClanWarHandler src\server\model\minigames\clanwars\ClanWarHandler.java:111: error: cannot find symbol ClanWar clanWar = clanWars[c.clanWarId]; ^ symbol: class ClanWar location: class ClanWarHandler src\server\model\minigames\clanwars\ClanWarHandler.java:164: error: cannot find symbol ClanWar clanWar = clanWars[c.clanWarId]; ^ symbol: class ClanWar location: class ClanWarHandler src\server\model\minigames\clanwars\ClanWarHandler.java:227: error: cannot find symbol ClanWar clanWar = clanWars[c.clanWarId]; ^ symbol: class ClanWar location: class ClanWarHandler src\server\model\minigames\clanwars\ClanWarHandler.java:280: error: cannot find symbol clanWars[clanWarId] = new ClanWar(c.playerId, c2.playerId, ((c.p layerId + c2.playerId) * 4), clanWarId, 120); ^ symbol: class ClanWar location: class ClanWarHandler src\server\model\minigames\clanwars\ClanWarHandler.java:327: error: cannot find symbol ClanWar clanWar = clanWars[c.clanWarId]; ^ symbol: class ClanWar location: class ClanWarHandler src\server\model\minigames\clanwars\ClanWarHandler.java:368: error: method messa geToClan in class ClanChatHandler cannot be applied to given types; Server.clanChat.messageToClan("The other team's leader h as forfeited.", PlayerHandler.players[c.clanWarOpponent].clanId, true); ^ required: String,int found: String,int,boolean reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length src\server\model\minigames\clanwars\ClanWarHandler.java:369: error: method messa geToClan in class ClanChatHandler cannot be applied to given types; Server.clanChat.messageToClan("Your owner left the Clan Chat. The match was forfeited.", c.clanId, true); ^ required: String,int found: String,int,boolean reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1176: error: cannot find symbol c.getClanWars().handleKill(c, o); ^ symbol: variable o location: class PlayerAssistant src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:3196: error: missing return value return; ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 18 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
If anyone could explain what they mean, don't tell me how to fix directly - I wanna learn.

item.title: Errors help!
item.dc:creator: @Harvi Harvi
item.description:
@Harvi wrote:

ahhhhhh thank you! omg facepalm!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Errors help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

If you’re using a compiler (The .bat) your error is likely because you do not have that directory included into the compile-time path.

Right click the .bat and hit edit. Scroll to the left and add the full path to the folder (With *.java trailing so it knows to compile ALL files).

ex:
src/server/model/minigames/clanwars/*.java

Read full topic

item.title: Errors help!
item.dc:creator: @Harvi Harvi
item.description:
@Harvi wrote:

Pure_:

You need to import ClanWarHandler, ie if it’s in package net.handler then at the top of your file add import net.handle.ClanWarHandler.

tried that but gives another error, telling me that the package does not exist and I am sure its the right path:

import.server.model.minigames.clanwars.*;

Read full topic

item.title: Errors help!
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You need to import ClanWarHandler, ie if it’s in package net.handler then at the top of your file add import net.handle.ClanWarHandler.

Read full topic
